name: mini gansey sweater
notes:
**skill level:**
intermediate

**sizes:**
2 (3/4, 5/6, 7/8, 9/10) years

**finished measurements:**
chest measurements: 25.5 (27, 30, 31.5, 33)”
full length: 14 (15, 16, 17.5, 19)”

**gauge**
16 sts x 22 rows/rounds = 4” in stockinette st
16 sts x 28 rows/rounds = 4” in texture patterns

**materials**
yarn citizen unity worsted (100% wool; 100g/211 yds): 
3 (4, 4, 5, 5) skeins
shown in sage
needles: us size 8 (5 mm) 16 and 32" circular needles 
and dpns (set of 4)
or size needed to obtain gauge
notions: stitch markers
